channel.title: C# on clipperhouse
channel.description: Recent content in C# on clipperhouse

item.title: Toward less injection
item.description: Here’s a habit that may help to reduce the complexity of your dependency injection tree. Ask yourself: how much of an injected dependency are you actually using?

item.title: Statements are statements, and expressions are expressions (in Go)
item.description: I got trolled by a facetious article on Go on April 1. But it did trigger a conversation about why Go doesn’t do certain things other languages do.
